titleStmt.title: The last words of Thomas Lord Pride taken in short-hand by T.S., late clerk to his Lordship's brew-house.
titleStmt.author: T. S.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: copy at reel 1338:5 has pages cropped with some loss of print and has Huntington Library copy spliced at end; copy at reel 1742:27 creased and stained.
This item appears at reel 1338:5 as Wing P3411 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1742:27 as Wing (2nd ed.) L534A.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library, Huntington Library.
